title: Guid Generator
whatsnew:
• 🚀 Launch of the GUID Generator tool on dhimanp

  • 🔄 Generate single or multiple GUIDs instantly

  • 📋 Enhanced copy-to-clipboard functionality

  • 📱 Optimized UI for both desktop and mobile devices
longDescription:
GUID Generator by dhimanp is a simple, secure, and developer-friendly tool for instantly generating Globally Unique Identifiers (GUIDs). Whether you're building software, assigning identifiers, or handling data with uniqueness constraints, this utility makes it effortless.

With a single click, you can generate clean, RFC-compliant GUIDs/UUIDs without any installations, logins, or distractions. It’s designed to support developers, QA engineers, system architects, and database administrators in maintaining best practices for unique data identification.

⚙️ Key Features:

  • ⚡ Generate 100% random, RFC 4122-compliant GUIDs

  • 🔁 Option to create multiple GUIDs at once

  • 📋 One-click copy to clipboard

  • 🔐 Privacy-friendly – no data is stored or tracked

  • 📱 Lightweight, mobile-responsive web interface

  • 🌐 Works seamlessly across all modern browsers

Whether you're working on APIs, databases, or software testing, DhimanP’s GUID Generator helps you streamline development with secure and globally unique IDs.
